frontmatter.title: New Website powered with Gatsby
frontmatter.excerpt: New website – new tools. I've created a lot of website a while ago. As an auto-entrepreneur, as a CTO @eoko, for customers, for friends and now... just for me. I moved from Joomla, Drupal and finally I also moved from Wordpress 8 years ago for nice, handcraft website.
frontmatter.author: romain-dary
